description:
Remove URL command line filtering from main startup path.

Update to fix startup performance regression for http://codereview.chromium.org/550008

BUG=9862
TEST=browser_tests --gtest_filter=BrowserInitTest.BlockBadURLs


Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=36351

messages.text: The patch didn't send the perf bots red, but after looking a bit more I think you're right. There's no reason to initialize the ChildProcessSecurityPolicy singleton until we need it. So, I've moved it into the URL checking loop.

subject: Remove URL command line filtering from main startup path....
